data.message: Helllo fb, I need you help but u just removed my post??!

replies.message: Hi there. We just responded to your earlier comment! Let us know if you have any additional questions. -Kiara

Thank for ur attention im so glad , I can't found anywhere that really help me ... And so sorry for posing my problem here... I m insult by a stanger but nothing I can do after he had put me in the block list, even can't report it to fb
Can you help me with my problem too facebook? I messeged you many times. I know youre not blind
We're so sorry you're experiencing this. You can report this message to us by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2jEGMni. -Kiara
